publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-2463 Mary Mulligan: The Education (Means Testing) (Scotland) Amendment Regulations 2008—That the Education, Lifelong Learning and Culture Committee recommends that nothing further be done under the Education (Means Testing) (Scotland) Amendment Regulations 2008 (SSI 2008/206).

S3M-2463 Mary Mulligan: The Education (Means Testing) (Scotland) Amendment Regulations 2008—That the Education, Lifelong Learning and Culture Committee recommends that nothing further be done under the Education (Means Testing) (Scotland) Amendment Regulations 2008 (SSI 2008/206).
